==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=胡同|t2=胡同}}

===Etymology===
First attested in the Mongol-ruled {{w|Yuan Dynasty}}.

From {{etyl|xng|zh}} {{m|xng|ᠬᠤᠳᠳᠤᠭ||water well}} (> {{cog|mn|худаг}}), indicating that people could live only where wells could be dug.

Alternative theory postulates that this is borrowed from {{der|zh|xng|ᠭᠤᠳᠤᠮ||corridor, passage, passageway}} (> {{cog|mn|гудам}}).
